Name: Remsen Cooler
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and serve with straws.
Review: Scotch and soda for the sophisticate.
History: Originally, circa 1890, it was made with Old Tom gin, but in more recent decades, more commonly based on Scotch whisky. The first recipe book to include a Remsen Cooler was Hon. William Boothby 's 1891 Cocktail Boothby's American Bar-Tender .
Nutrition: One serving of Remsen Cooler contains 133 calories
